contents.text: Welcome to Cradlepoint, your South Bay experts in enterprise-grade network hardware.
For Sales and Product Information, press 1.
For details on our device portfolio, including CR4250, AER2200, and AER1600 series, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a product specialist for device information.

navigationGoals: I need detailed specifications for the AER2200 series routers.
I want to compare CR4250 and AER2200 device specs to decide which suits my mobile command post.
I need detailed specifications and feature comparisons between the CR4250, AER2200, and AER1600 to choose the right router for our SD-WAN deployment.
I need help understanding the differences between your CR4250 and AER1600 routers to choose the right one for my small home office.
Get detailed specifications and performance benchmarks for the AER2200 router for my lab's sensor network.

contents.text: For pricing, ordering, and shipment inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for pricing and orders.

navigationGoals: I want a price quote and delivery timeline for ordering CR4250 units.
I need pricing and delivery estimates for ordering several AER1600 routers for my veteran outreach program.
I’d like to get a formal quote for ordering 20 units of the CR4250 series, including bulk pricing, lead times, and shipping options.
I’d like to get pricing and place an order for a new AER2200 router, and find out when it will ship.
Request pricing, availability, and shipping timelines for ordering two AER1600 units for a research project.

contents.text: For troubleshooting our COR IBR600B, 900, 1100, and 1700 series routers, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing connection dropouts on my COR IBR900 router and need troubleshooting.
I'm having intermittent connectivity on my COR IBR900 and need help troubleshooting it.
I’m experiencing intermittent packet loss on our COR IBR600B in the field and need help troubleshooting whether it’s a hardware or firmware issue.
My COR IBR600B router has stopped connecting to the internet—I need help troubleshooting it.
Troubleshoot intermittent LTE connectivity on my COR IBR1100 router that's disrupting my data logging.

contents.text: For help with Cradlepoint Virtual Router, firmware updates, and software, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to firmware and software support.

navigationGoals: I need assistance updating the firmware on my Cradlepoint Virtual Router.
I need assistance updating the firmware on my Cradlepoint Virtual Router to the latest version.
I want guidance on upgrading the firmware for our Cradlepoint Virtual Router to the latest NetCloud OS release and how to handle rollbacks if needed.
I’d like assistance updating the firmware on my Cradlepoint virtual router and installing the latest software.
Guide me through updating the firmware on my Cradlepoint Virtual Router to the latest release for my simulations.
